changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Patterns' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Attributes') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Patterns' AND "language"='en-US') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Reports' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Data Delivery Objects') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Reports' AND "language"='en-US') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Databases' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Db Databases') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Databases' AND "language"='en-US') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Tables' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Db Tables') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Tables' AND "language"='en-US') ;
changeSet.comment: Updates/new translations Used objects: language_translate Phabricator tasks: T259
